name: E-Racer
description:
Fast action drift roads where you tap around the obstacles and avoid the erase chasing you! The twisty road made out of doodles makes this an extreme road trip for all ages. Avoid the road blocks and race against the eraser to avoid getting erased. Buy new cars in this endless road trip and become the best sling drifter! Turn right or left to avoid the ink traps and obstacles.

One tap easy to learn controls with addictive gameplay!
